div.div:
Bronwyn - December 14, 2011 - Samsung Stratosphere with version 1.9
Very nicely done
The only thing missing (which I feel could greatly improve the app) is a feature that sings the alphabet song and says the numbers straight thru.

dorothy - April 20, 2012 - Version 1.9
Amazing!
My there year old daughter loves this app! She is learning so much, so fast! The best thing about it is that she's having fun and learning at the same time!

Myk - February 4, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.9
Resetting issue?
Love the app...although ever since it downloaded, I am experiencing issues with loss of sound (on the app) a well as my phone randomly freezes and resets.

melvin - July 26, 2011 - HTC myTouch 3G with version 1.9
This app is very well done. 6 stars if I could. Mytouch3g

Rupesh - June 24, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Tab with version 1.9
it works great
kc was a great help, the app. works great, exactly what i was looking for. this is far better than other similar application. i recommend kcToolbox

Susan - April 3, 2011 - Version 1.9
What fun!
This is such a great game! Lots of fun switching to different topic--colors, numbers, animals etc--it really keeps the kiddos entertained while they're learning.

Tanya - July 5, 2011 - LG Optimus One with version 1.9
My 2 yr old's fave part is the spinning color wheel. I like that ...
My 2 yr old's fave part is the spinning color wheel. I like that it's easy for him to use.

google - October 15, 2011 - Version 1.9
Great App
Been searching for a good rounded educational app, and this does everything.

Kimberly - July 26, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 1.9
Some animals are overly specific ... But my son still loves it

Deborah - July 12, 2011 - Version 1.9
Brilliant!

casey - July 4, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.8.1
Fun & educational. I have it on my Droid and just put it on ...
Fun & educational. I have it on my Droid and just put it on my new Galaxy Tab 10.1 too.

Nicole - June 8, 2011 - Version 1.8
Downloaded, never received app.

crazythunder - May 7, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 1.6.3
Pretty nice but you need to add an exit button. Had to force close ...
Pretty nice but you need to add an exit button. Had to force close it manually with task manager

Ann - May 7, 2011 - HTC Nexus One with version 1.6.3
Press home key to exit...or turn off the button block...

Graham - April 30, 2011 - HTC Incredible S with version 1.6.3
Very good App, especially (as a Brit) the "zed" for Z. The author even ...
Very good App, especially (as a Brit) the "zed" for Z. The author even updated the App in response to a criticism left on my comment and fixed it!

kitty - April 28, 2011 - Version 1.6.2
Good app. A+

Allison - February 21, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.5.1
This app is great for my 4 year old. I love that it has ...
This app is great for my 4 year old. I love that it has multiple topics included! I would gladly pay more for this wonderful learning tool!

isalu - November 7, 2010 - HTC Droid Eris with version 1.5.1
Nice overall, but I wish it did the letter sounds too. At the very ...
Nice overall, but I wish it did the letter sounds too. At the very least, I would like a short i word like igloo instead of ice cream.

Ava - March 14, 2011 - Version 1.5.1
My daughter loves this game. She knows all her colors and numbers

Roman - March 4, 2011 - Version 1.5.1
Great app only need function installation on/from SD

Meg - November 23, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 1.5.1
My son loves this app and so does Mommy! It keeps him occupied when ...
My son loves this app and so does Mommy! It keeps him occupied when we are out running errands & it's educational!

aslana - December 28, 2010 - Version 1.5.1
Darn good hope new stuff comes out love the way it works

Krista - November 21, 2010 - Version 1.5.1
Fun&educ app for my 4yo & 23mo. When tap pic of item on flashcard, ...
Fun&educ app for my 4yo & 23mo. When tap pic of item on flashcard, item name should be announced but rarely is. That inconsistency frustrates my 4yo.

Jeremy - September 3, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 1.5
My 3 year old son loves this app. Droid.

Mindy - August 9, 2010 - Version 1.5
My 2 yr old has completed the whole app..he knows the alpha, all the ...
My 2 yr old has completed the whole app..he knows the alpha, all the numbers an all colors plus learned all the flash cards.please update add more plz

andrea - November 20, 2010 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.5
Good.. just wish touchpad could b disabled to prevent having to restart every time ...
Good.. just wish touchpad could b disabled to prevent having to restart every time my LO pushes button on phone

Rob - July 8, 2010 - Version 1.5
Good app for free

clutch5776 - May 20, 2010 - HTC Hero with version 1.4
Love the App, please add a lock option. My son likes to hit the ...
Love the App, please add a lock option. My son likes to hit the call button:(

sandie - November 7, 2010 - Version 1.4
Had this since baby was 1 yr, what a super app! Where else can ...
Had this since baby was 1 yr, what a super app! Where else can you get all this learning for such a small price? Now that she is 2 its priceless!

joey - February 22, 2010 - Version 1.4
Great app for my 23 month old daughter. Recommended for all toddlers!!!!!

Jasmine - May 1, 2010 - HTC Evo 4G with version 1.4
Awesome app!! Its worth EVERY penny...

Amazing my 20 month old has learned so many words from the flash cards. It is an amazing app

Great app! My 4 year old loves it!

Very nice!

This fun game keeps getting better and better! Great features on this new update! ...
This fun game keeps getting better and better! Great features on this new update! My niece and nephew had been having so much funs with it. Thanks!

Peter - December 2, 2009 - Version 1.1
Cool graphics, but did work for number.the voice correctly said the number, but the ...
Cool graphics, but did work for number.the voice correctly said the number, but the animation showed the wrong count. I got some errors as well.

My kids love this app. They always ask for my phone so they can ...
My kids love this app. They always ask for my phone so they can use it.

Very useful. My son has learned the alphabet through this app and wants to ...
Very useful. My son has learned the alphabet through this app and wants to play with my phone now all the time.

Angela - November 25, 2009 - Version 1.1
Great App Just Wish That My Son Could Not Click Out Of The App.

Niki - December 16, 2009 - Motorola Droid with version 1.2
Not bad... Could use more

Mel - January 12, 2010 - Motorola Droid with version 1.2
My 3.5 year old loves this. Good voice, too. Love toggling to shuffle for ...
My 3.5 year old loves this. Good voice, too. Love toggling to shuffle for extra challenge.
